Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Padiwesir with a darker lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; the leg section is inscribed with five rows of dark-blue Hieroglyphs; back-pillar and plinth.
Curator's comments: Petrie, Abydos I, 38-9, pl.LXXIX, 2, middle left.
